 Egypt postal code is different from one city to  another. The below charts postal codes from various cities in Egypt. 2155221514215212152221523215182152721515215112156221558215512155721923215612161621517215392156621516215252153121634 81718816248162781631815258151381647815368172881611 416114162641618415174151641522415124151141557 4352743514435114371143712 6151961631616716151261511 7162171611716317164171622717237152671521716157151471517 8451184515847128471584722 8371983651836218303983661837248374983511 3174131719315123161131714317393164131631 11566118271176211851 117421152111728116281155311519115591156211516116121161811617 859528595685957859548581185951 318163181131629316243162131961 2261122612225162251122731227442295122755 86551251112521126111265212651 8251882514827478274982633827388262182786 33512 33611 The first number is of the region, the second of the province, the third of the type of service and the last numbers refers to the delivery area or the post office. You can find the exact postal code of the wanted  region at any postal office.
